lorentz 1.1-1
  • Reference

Coerce 3-vectors and 4-vectors to a matrix

as.matrix.Rd

Coerce 3-vectors and 4-vectors to a matrix. A convenience wrapper for unclass()

Usage

# S3 method for 3vel
as.matrix(x, ...)
# S3 method for 4vel
as.matrix(x, ...)

Arguments

x

Object of class 3vel or 4vel

...

Further arguments (currently ignored)

Author

Robin K. S. Hankin

Examples

as.matrix(r3vel(5))
#>                x          y          z
#> [1,]  0.38322777 -0.3374168 -0.3118571
#> [2,]  0.04445227  0.2850048 -0.1986674
#> [3,] -0.56202071  0.5623740  0.2356478
#> [4,]  0.17423034 -0.8089070 -0.4233192
#> [5,] -0.22450208 -0.8113352  0.1515181
as.matrix(r4vel(5))
#>             t          x           y          z
#> [1,] 2.012691  0.7956341 -1.40695517  0.6620951
#> [2,] 1.614875  0.9487225 -0.07773726 -0.8376769
#> [3,] 2.837800  2.1762597  1.18778980 -0.9519247
#> [4,] 1.137670 -0.1982417 -0.48180900  0.1511716
#> [5,] 1.081015 -0.2965856  0.23227457 -0.1633364
